short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Push your shopping cart into a Draft ProcurementExpress.com Purchase Order

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Push Cart is a Google Chrome application that takes a shopping cart page and turns the detail on the shopping cart  into a draft purchase order within ProcurementExpress.com

It works for many shopping carts, including Amazon.com, BestBuy.com, Lowes.com, wayfair.com and many others.

Any user of ProcurementExpress.com will find that it will reduce the time that they need to spend to copy and paste their items into the purchase order system.

The Amazon integration has a "Buy Now" button that automatically creates a shopping cart from the purchase order. 
While the chrome extension is completely free, as an Amazon affiliate, we make money from  commissions for products bought.
